verses.verse: On that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2001>Haman,<s%> the <S%H6887>enemy<s%> of the <S%H3064>Jews,<s%> to <S%H4436>Queen<s%> <S%H635>Esther;<s%> and <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> for <S%H635>Esther<s%> had <S%H5046>disclosed<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> he was to her.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5493>took<s%> <S%H5493>off<s%> his <S%H2885>signet<s%> <S%H2885>ring<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H5674>taken<s%> <S%H5674>away<s%> from <S%H2001>Haman,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it to <S%H4782>Mordecai.<s%> And <S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2001>Haman.<s%>

Then <S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> at his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> <S%H1058>wept,<s%> and <S%H2603>implored<s%> him to <S%H5674>avert<s%> the <S%H9567>evil<s%> [scheme] of <S%H2001>Haman<s%> the <S%H91>Agagite<s%> and his <S%H4284>plot<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H2803>devised<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3447>extended<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H8275>scepter<s%> to <S%H635>Esther.<s%> So <S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

Then she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> it <S%H5921>pleases<s%> <S%H2895><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him and the <S%H1697>matter<s%> [seems] <S%H3787>proper<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> and I am <S%H2896>pleasing<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight,<s%> let it be <S%H3789>written<s%> to <S%H7725>revoke<s%> the <S%H5612>letters<s%> <S%H4284>devised<s%> by <S%H2001>Haman,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H9097>Hammedatha<s%> the <S%H91>Agagite,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> to destroy the <S%H6>Jews<s%> <S%H3064>who<s%> are in <S%H834>all<s%> the king's <S%H3605>provinces.<s%>

"For <S%H9010>how<s%> <S%H3201>can<s%> I <S%H3201>endure<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H9567>calamity<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall <S%H4672>befall<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H9010>how<s%> <S%H3201>can<s%> I <S%H3201>endure<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H12>destruction<s%> of my <S%H4138>kindred<s%>?"

So <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4436>Queen<s%> <S%H635>Esther<s%> and to <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> the <S%H3064>Jew,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2001>Haman<s%> to <S%H635>Esther,<s%> and him they have <S%H8518>hanged<s%> on the <S%H6086>gallows<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> he had <S%H7971>stretched<s%> out his <S%H3027>hands<s%> against the <S%H3064>Jews.<s%>

"Now you <S%H3789>write<s%> to the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> as you <S%H5869>see<s%> <S%H2896>fit,<s%> in the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H2856>seal<s%> [it] with the king's <S%H2885>signet<s%> <S%H2885>ring;<s%> for a <S%H3791>decree<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the king and <S%H2856>sealed<s%> with the king's <S%H2885>signet<s%> <S%H2885>ring<s%> may not be <S%H7725>revoked.<s%>"

So the king's <S%H9373>scribes<s%> were <S%H7121>called<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%> in the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> (that is, the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H5510>Sivan<s%>), on the twenty-third day; and it was <S%H3789>written<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to the <S%H3064>Jews,<s%> the <S%H323>satraps,<s%> the <S%H6346>governors,<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4082>provinces<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [extended] from <S%H1912>India<s%> to <S%H3568>Ethiopia,<s%> 127 <S%H4082>provinces,<s%> to <S%H4082>every<s%> <S%H4082>province<s%> according to its <S%H3791>script,<s%> and to <S%H5971>every<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> according to their <S%H3956>language,<s%> as well as to the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> according to their <S%H3791>script<s%> and their <S%H3956>language.<s%>

And he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus,<s%> and <S%H2856>sealed<s%> it with the king's <S%H2885>signet<s%> <S%H2885>ring,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5612>letters<s%> by <S%H7323>couriers<s%> on <S%H5483>horses,<s%> <S%H7392>riding<s%> on <S%H7409>steeds<s%> <S%H1121>sired<s%> by the <S%H7424>royal<s%> <S%H7424>stud.<s%>

In them the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>granted<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were in <S%H5892>each<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> [the right] to <S%H6950>assemble<s%> and to <S%H5975>defend<s%> their <S%H5315>lives,<s%> to <S%H8045>destroy,<s%> to <S%H2026>kill,<s%> and to annihilate the <S%H6>entire<s%> <S%H3605>army<s%> of any <S%H2428>people<s%> or <S%H5971>province<s%> which might <S%H4082>attack<s%> them, <S%H9475>including<s%> <S%H854>children<s%> and <S%H2945>women,<s%> and to <S%H802>plunder<s%> their <S%H962>spoil,<s%>

on <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4082>provinces<s%> of <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus,<s%> the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> [day] of the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> (that is, the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H143>Adar<s%>).

A <S%H6572>copy<s%> of the <S%H3791>edict<s%> to be <S%H5414>issued<s%> as <S%H1881>law<s%> in <S%H4082>each<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4082>province,<s%> was <S%H1540>published<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> so that the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> should be <S%H6264>ready<s%> for <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H5358>avenge<s%> themselves on their <S%H340>enemies.<s%>

The <S%H7323>couriers,<s%> <S%H926>hastened<s%> and <S%H1765>impelled<s%> by the king's <S%H1697>command,<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out, <S%H7392>riding<s%> on the <S%H327>royal<s%> <S%H7409>steeds;<s%> and the <S%H1881>decree<s%> was <S%H5414>given<s%> out in <S%H7800>Susa<s%> the <S%H1002>capital.<s%>

Then <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H4438>royal<s%> <S%H3830>robes<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H2353>white,<s%> with a <S%H1419>large<s%> <S%H5850>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and a <S%H8509>garment<s%> of <S%H948>fine<s%> <S%H948>linen<s%> and <S%H713>purple;<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H7800>Susa<s%> <S%H6670>shouted<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoiced.<s%>
For the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> there was <S%H9004>light<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness<s%> and <S%H8342>joy<s%> and <S%H3366>honor.<s%>

And in <S%H4082>each<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4082>province,<s%> and in <S%H5892>each<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H4725>wherever<s%> <S%H834><s%> the king's <S%H1697>commandment<s%> and his <S%H1881>decree<s%> <S%H5060>arrived,<s%> there was <S%H8057>gladness<s%> and <S%H8342>joy<s%> for the <S%H3064>Jews,<s%> a <S%H4960>feast<s%> and a <S%H2896>holiday.<s%> <S%H3117><s%> And <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4480>among<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3054>became<s%> <S%H3054>Jews,<s%> for the <S%H6343>dread<s%> of the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> had <S%H5307>fallen<s%> on them.
